mapper.select: select count(*) from topicstatistics where topic = #{topic} and infodate = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')
mapper.insert: insert into topicstatistics (topic, infoDate, resultcount) values (#{item.topic}, #{item.infoDate}, #{item.resultCount})
mapper.select: select a.id from topic a where a.title not in ( select topic from topicstatistics where infodate = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD'))
